name: Aqua Bros!
description:
AquaBros! puts you in control of an unlikely assortment of fishy friends to attack a pirate base on a sandy island in the middle of a vaguely Caribbean ocean. For mobile, it’s sort of a reverse tower defense game. Join War Turtle, Hammer Shark, and the mighty Da’ Kraken to battle that tower!

Alpha of the game can be downloaded from the GGJ page here: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/aquabros
Originally made as part of GGJ 2017 – theme: Waves.
